long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your Etsy management experience with Etsy Finance Restrictor! This extension is designed to help you manage access to financial sections of your Etsy dashboard, ensuring a focused, secure, and clutter-free workspace.

Features:

Hide Finance Links: Easily hide finance-related links and sections on your Etsy dashboard to reduce distractions and keep your workspace clean.

Page Redirection for Restricted Areas: Automatically redirect away from sensitive financial pages like payments, statements, and taxpayer information to maintain focus and security.

License-Based Access Control: Activate features based on your valid license key—simply enter your key and enjoy a streamlined experience.

Smart Script Injection: Dynamically applies changes only when needed, ensuring your browsing experience remains smooth and responsive.

Daily License Verification: The extension checks your license validity automatically each day, ensuring seamless usage without interruptions.

Etsy Finance Restrictor is designed with privacy in mind: it only activates on Etsy-related pages, and no browsing data is collected or stored beyond what’s needed for functionality.

Simplify your Etsy management process, enhance security, and maintain focus with Etsy Finance Restrictor!

Note: A valid license key is required for full access to the features of this extension.
